      • getResourceToolExists

        public boolean getResourceToolExists()
        Determines if Resource tool part of the site. Needed to store podcasts.

      • getPodcastFolderExists

        public boolean getPodcastFolderExists()
        Determines if the podcast folder exists. If it does not, it will attempt to create it.
        Returns:
        boolean TRUE if folder exists, FALSE otherwise.

      • getURL

        public String getURL()
        Returns the URL to point your podcatcher to in order to grab the feed.
        Returns:
        String The feed URL.

      • processPermissions

        public String processPermissions()
        Constructs call to permissions helper and redirects to it to display Podcasts folder permissions page.

        Used to inject the podcast service into this bean.

        podcastService - The podcast service this bean needs

      • getAPodcast

        public podHomeBean.DecoratedPodcastBean getAPodcast(ContentResource podcastResource,
                                           boolean folderHidden)
                                             throws EntityPropertyNotDefinedException,
                                                    EntityPropertyTypeException
        Receives a particular podcast and packages it as a DecoratedPodcastBean
        Parameters:
        podcastProperties - Contains the ResourceProperties object of a podcast resource
        resourceId - The resource ID for the podcast
        Returns:
        DecoratedPodcastBean The packaged podcast or null and exception if problems
        Throws:
        EntityPropertyNotDefinedException - The property wanted was not found
        EntityPropertyTypeException - The property (Date/Time) was not a valid one

      • getContents

        public List getContents()
        Construct a List of DecoratedPodcastBeans for display on main page
        Returns:
        List List of DecoratedPodcastBeans that are the podcasts

      • processFileUpload

        public void processFileUpload(javax.faces.event.ValueChangeEvent event)
                       throws javax.faces.event.AbortProcessingException
        Creates a BufferedInputStream to get ready to upload file selected. Used by Add Podcast and Revise Podcast pages.
        Parameters:
        event - ValueChangeEvent object generated by selecting a file to upload.
        Throws:
        javax.faces.event.AbortProcessingException - Internal processing error attempting to set up BufferedInputStream

      • processAdd

        public String processAdd()
        Performs the actual adding of a podcast. Calls PodcastService to actually add the podcast.
        Returns:
        String Sent to return to main page.

      • processCancelAdd

        public String processCancelAdd()
        Erases bean values since no podcast is to be added.
        Returns:
        String Sent to return to main page.

        Used to call podcastService to actually delete selected podcast.
